snippet: Casino giant Las Vegas Sands Corp. said Tuesday that hacking into their websites and internal systems last week went deeper than the company had previously known....

headline.print_headline: Sands: Hacking Went Further Than Email, Websites
headline.main: Sands: Hacking Went Further Than Email, Websites

lead_paragraph: Casino giant Las Vegas Sands Corp. said Tuesday that hacking into their websites and internal systems last week went deeper than the company had previously known.
